title: Mistress of Devil's Manor
description: A Demonic Power That Reached Beyond The Grave....A century earlier, a man and two women had played out a grisly drama of betrayal and death in the big old house. Now a different kind of horror had begun. A young girl, hideously disfigured, had been found dying near the place. Another had disappeared without a trace.Only Kitty Telefair, the renowned psychic, could dispel the growing evil. But suddenly, terrifyingly and against her will, Kitty herself began to crumple before the demonic power that reached out beyond the grave....
author: Florence Stevenson
